name: HitTrapClassics
0:
”Alexa, open hit trap classics”
”Alexa, ask hit trap classics for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start hit trap classics”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hit trap classics
des: Listen to the Classic RnB Soul Rap Reggae Pop Rock Hits. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
